LOCAL PRE-TRIAL A-CDM OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES ARE IN FORCE AT AIRPORT. -GROUND HANDLER (GH) ARE TO REPORT AND UPDATE TOBT (TARGET OFF- BLOCK TIME). -TSAT (TARGET START-UP APPROVAL TIME) WILL BE COMMUNICATED TO AIRSPACE USER BY GROUND HANDLER (GH). -WHERE A-VDGS (ADVANCED VISUAL DOCKING GUIDANCE SYSTEM) IS AVAILABLE TOBT AND TSAT WILL BE DISPLAYED. -THE PILOT SHALL REQUEST AN UPDATE TO THE TOBT FROM THE GROUND HANDLER (GH) IF THE TOBT CANNOT BE MET AT ANY MOMENT. -THE PILOT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE AIRCRAFT WILL BE READY FOR START UP CLEARANCE AND WILL HAVE CONTACT ON THE DELIVERY FREQUENCY WITHIN THE TSAT WINDOW (+/-5 MINS). -DEPARTURE CLEARANCE (EXCEPT SQUAWK) SHALL BE AVAILABLE 18 MINUTES BEFORE EOBT OR LATER. - THE PILOT SHALL CONTACT GROUND CONTROL FOR PUSH BACK OR TAXI WITHIN 5 MIN FROM OBTAINING START UP CLEARANCE (ASAT). - IF NO PUSH BACK OR TAXI REQUESTED AT ASAT+5, TSAT WILL EXPIRE, AND A NEW TOBT WILL BE REQUIRED FOR THE FLIGHT TO BE INCLUDED IN THE DEPARTURE SEQUENCE AND RECEIVE A NEW TSAT. -PUSH AND HOLD PROCEDURES WILL BE USED TO AVOID HOLDING ARRIVING AIRCRAFT IN CASE OF OCCUPIED STANDS.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED ALL AIRCRAFT TO ENTER TURKISH AIRSPACE VIA TOMBI OR VESAR ENTRY/EXIT POINTS,UNTIL THEY ARRIVE THE SUBJECT POINTS,SHALL CONTACT TO ANKARA ACC THROUGH 127.85,128.75,130.4,124.075 MHZ OR THE EMERGENCY CHANNELS. ANY AIRCRAFT NOT CONTACT TO ANKARA ACC UNTIL REACHING TO THE TOMBI OR VESAR ENTRY/EXIT POINTS SHALL NOT BE PERMITTED TO ENTER TURKISH AIRSPACE.REF NOTAM A2948/13

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: NAVIGATIONAL WARNING IN ADDITION TO THE REQUIREMENT AND CONSIDERATIONS REFERRED TO IN TRNC NOTAM NR:0078/06,ALL AIRCRAFT TO ENTER THE ANKARA FIR VIA TOMBI OR VESAR SHALL ALSO ESTABLISH CONTACT WITH ANKARA CONTROL ON 127.85,128.75,130.4,124.075 MHZ OR EMERGENCY CHANNELS NOT LESS THAN 10NM TO TOMBI OR VESAR ENTRY/EXIT POINTS. ********************** LIDO REMARK ********************** MENTIONED NOTAM 78/06 IS FROM THE TURKEY PART OF CYPRUS ************ AS OF 24DEC TEL INFO GIVEN BY ACC ANKARA, RADIO CONTACT WITH ANKARA CONTROL SHOULD BE ESTABILISHED 10 MIN TO TOMBI OR VESAR ******************* END OF LIDO REMARK ******************

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: NAVIGATIONAL WARNING IN ORDER TO ENSURE NAVIGATIONAL SAFETY AND IN CONSIDERATION OF ADDITIONAL SENSITIVITY IN THE REGION, ALL AIRCRAFT WITHIN ERCAN ADVISORY AIRSPACE TO ENTER ANKARA FIR VIA TOMBI OR VESAR SHALL ESTABLISH CONTACT WITH ERCAN CONTROL ON 126.7 MHZ OR EMERGENCY CHANNELS.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: ALL FLIGHT CREWS ARE KINDLY REQUESTED WHENEVER THEY NOTICE A FOREST FIRE WHILE FLYING OVER CYPRUS TO REPORT IT TO NICOSIA ACC OR LARNAKA AND PAFOS CONTROL TOWERS IMMEDIATELY

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED: INFORMATION HAS BEEN RECEIVED THAT THE TURKISH MILITARY FORCES SHALL MAKE EXERCISE WITHIN THE NORTH EAST PART OF NICOSIA FIR. EXERCISE HAS NOT BEEN COORDINATED WITH THE CYPRUS AUTHORITIES WHICH ARE RESPONSIBLE TO PROMULGATE INFORMATION REGARDING NICOSIA FIR AND IS NOT VERIFIED. EXERCISE AREA OVERLAPS NUMEROUS AIRWAYS SERVING A LARGE VOLUME OF INTERNATIONAL CIVIL AIR TRAFFIC. FOR THIS REASON SEVERAL AIRWAYS ARE CLOSED SO THE SAFETY OF AIR TRAFFIC IS ENSURED, DESPITE THE NEGATIVE IMPACT IN REGULARITY AND COST-EFFICIENCY. PILOTS TO EXERCISE CAUTION AND MAINTAIN CONTINUOUS RADIO CONTACT WITH NICOSIA ACC, FREQ 126.3MHZ FL165 - FL295

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: GNSS JAMMING AND SPOOFING OCCURRENCES HAVE BEEN REPORTED WITHIN NICOSIA FIR. CREWS TO REMAIN VIGILANT AND REPORT TO ATC.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO NAVAL ARTILLERY EXERCISE AS REFERRED IN NOTAM LCNC A1376/24 THE FOLLOWING ROUTINGS SHALL BE USED FOR TRAFFIC OUT BEIRUT FIR: - TRAFFIC OUTBOUND BEIRUT FIR ENTERING HECC FIR AND THEN VIA MELDO ORSISIM SHALL PROCEED ELIKA N159/G2 VELOX DIRECT PIKOG DIRECT LAKTO - TRAFFIC OUTBOUND BEIRUT FIR ENTERING HECC FIR AND THEN VIA GENIV SHALL PROCEED ELIKA N159/G2 VELOX DIRECT PIKOG DIRECT PASOS. ALL ABOVE DIRECT ROUTES ARE AVAILABLE ABOVE FL195.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE SHUTTING DOWN OF THE DIRECT COMMUNICATION LINE BY TURKEY, DIRECT COMMUNICATION AND COORDINATION BETWEEN ANKARA AND NICOSIA AREA CONTROL CENTRES CAN NOT BE EFFECTED, THEREFORE: A. AIRCRAFT INBOUND TO NICOSIA FIR FROM ANKARA FIR SHALL ESTABLISH RADIO CONTACT WITH NICOSIA ACC IN ORDER TO PASS ESSENTIAL FLIGHT DETAILS (CALLSIGN, FL, ETO ENTRY POINT) ON FREQUENCY 125.5 FOR TOMBI AND 126.3 FOR VESAR AND DOREN, 10 MINUTES PRIOR TO ENTRY. B. AIRCRAFT INBOUND TO ANKARA FIR FROM NICOSIA FIR SHALL PASS FLIGHT DETAILS TO ANKARA ACC BEFORE ENTERING ANKARA FIR

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: PILOTS TO EXERCISE CAUTION DUE TO MILITARY AIRCRAFT OPERATING UNDER DUE REGARD AND NO TRANSPONDER WITHIN NICOSIA FIR
